data.text:
@pardoguerra @twittersecurity @manuelhborbolla @twittersecurity @TwitterSafety He proudly announces his ties to the state sponsored propaganda machine.

When will this account be labeled as such? https://t.co/aZmykUEaaD
He is spreading conspiracies about 1) neonazis in Ukraine, 2) covid, 3) Soros and "globalists", etc.
